author: Jessica Gooding
title: Penn made the right decision. We shouldn’t be on campus
description: Penn’s decision to limit on-campus housing and instruction is a positive step towards protecting public health. However, the timing of Penn’s announcement leaves much to be desired.

author: The Daily Pennsylvanian Editorial Board
title: Penn’s abrupt shift to a remote fall places a financial burden on students
description: Penn’s decision to limit on-campus housing and instruction is a positive step towards protecting public health. However, the timing of Penn’s announcement leaves much to be desired.

author: Charles Djou
title: President Trump Forgot Wharton's Lessons
description: While President Trump can flaunt his Wharton degree all he wants, it does not mean he actually learned anything at our alma mater.

author: Jaden Cloobeck
title: Lessons learned from the Influenza outbreak of 1918
description: Even though we can’t meet them in person, we can sympathize with Penn students who attended in fall 1918. Their past can inform our present. By using history as our compass, we can get through this together.
